name: grader
description: Template for cross-platform Node, JavaScript, HTML & CSS apps without the bloat. 'Massless' apps.

scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run pack-binary
scripts.build-nix: npm run bundle && npm run pack-binary-nix
scripts.pack-binary: npx nexe -t windows -o bin/grader.exe -i build/grader.js -r "./build/*.grader.js" -r "./src/public/*" && npx nexe -t linux-x64 -o bin/grader.nix -i build/grader.js -r "./build/*.grader.js" -r "./src/public/*" && npx nexe -t macos-x64 -o bin/grader.mac -i build/grader.js -r "./build/*.grader.js" -r "./src/public/*" && npx nexe -t windows-x32 -o bin/grader.win32.exe -i build/grader.js -r "./build/*.grader.js" -r "./src/public/*" && npx nexe -t linux-x32 -o bin/grader.nix32 -i build/grader.js -r "./build/*.grader.js" -r "./src/public/*"
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/ bin/ src/build/ || : && mkdir -p build && mkdir -p bin && mkdir -p src/build

author: @dosy
